dmca.title: Notice of Improper Activity and Evidence Preservation Request - hxxp://hotstat.net/cz
dmca.body:
_____  

From: MSOnlineSafety02 [mailto:Internet2@microsoft-onlinesafety.com] 
Sent: Thursday, December 08, 2005 5:07 AM
To: abuse@theplanet.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Notice of Improper Activity and Evidence Preservation Request -
hxxp://hotstat.net/czb/exploits/jocker/b.htm
hxxp://hotstat.net/czb/exploits/jocker/f.htm
Importance: High



VIA EMAIL: 

Date: 08 December 2005 

URL: hxxp://hotstat.net/czb/exploits/jocker/b.htm 
hxxp://hotstat.net/czb/exploits/jocker/f.htm 
Date of Activity: 08/12/2005 

Dear Sir or Madam, 

It has come to our attention that a website you are hosting is transmitting
malicious code without permission or authorization.

The site is located at hxxp://hotstat.net/czb/exploits/jocker/b.htm 
hxxp://hotstat.net/czb/exploits/jocker/f.htm and appears to be installing
trojans on victims machines. 

We are bringing this to your attention with the request that you investigate
the site and, based upon your discretion under your Terms and Conditions,
immediately take the site down to prevent the additional distribution of
malicious code which may be a crime in your country.  In addition, please
maintain and take whatever steps are necessary to prevent the destruction of
all records, including electronic records and webserver/IIS logs, in your
possession or control related to this site, account holder or subscriber.

If you have any questions, please contact us by replying to this email. We
appreciate your prompt cooperation in this matter. Please advise us
regarding what actions you take.


Yours sincerely, 

James Young 
Internet Investigator 

on behalf of Microsoft Corporation 
One Microsoft Way 
Redmond, WA 98052 
United States of America 

E-mail: internet1@microsoft-onlinesafety.com
